description: The Passage series is a versatile surf staple in Roark’s line, now constructed with a Hemp / Recycled Polyester Blend 4-Way Stretch. Translating to bird from te reo Tahiti, a certain nimble and vibrant manu sung us through trails while trekking through the lush island interior. The Passage Manu Floral evokes this song.
name: Roark Passage Manu Floral Boardshorts,17" Inseam - Mens
